**阔剑**（broadsword）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[近战](/index.php?title=%E8%BF%91%E6%88%98\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "近战 (page does not exist)")[武器](/wiki/%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8 "武器")。[武士](/index.php?title=%E6%AD%A6%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "武士 (page does not exist)")称其为**忍者大刀**（ninja-to）。

## 生成

阔剑在随机生成武器中占比0.8%。

此外，[岩德军团](/index.php?title=%E5%B2%A9%E5%BE%B7%E5%86%9B%E5%9B%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "岩德军团 (page does not exist)")中尉生成时有1⁄2的概率[携带](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")阔剑[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。[炎魔](/index.php?title=%E7%82%8E%E9%AD%94\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "炎魔 (page does not exist)")生成时一定会携带阔剑[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。

## 阔剑技能

| 阔剑   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| ---- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 最大等级 | [角色](/index.php?title=%E8%A7%92%E8%89%B2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "角色 (page does not exist)")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| 基础   | - [游客](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E5%AE%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游客 (page does not exist)")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| 熟练   | * [野蛮人](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8E%E8%9B%AE%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "野蛮人 (page does not exist)")、[骑士](/index.php?title=%E9%AA%91%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "骑士 (page does not exist)")、[盗贼](/index.php?title=%E7%9B%97%E8%B4%BC\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "盗贼 (page does not exist)")、[武士](/index.php?title=%E6%AD%A6%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "武士 (page does not exist)")、[女武神](/index.php?title=%E5%A5%B3%E6%AD%A6%E7%A5%9E\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "女武神 (page does not exist)") |

以下武器使用阔剑技能：

- 阔剑
- [精灵阔剑](/wiki/%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%E9%98%94%E5%89%91 "精灵阔剑")
- [符文剑](/wiki/%E7%AC%A6%E6%96%87%E5%89%91 "符文剑")
- [屠龙剑](/index.php?title=%E5%B1%A0%E9%BE%99%E5%89%91\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "屠龙剑 (page does not exist)")（神器类阔剑）
- [杀兽剑](/index.php?title=%E6%9D%80%E5%85%BD%E5%89%91\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "杀兽剑 (page does not exist)")（神器类精灵阔剑）
- [兴风者](/index.php?title=%E5%85%B4%E9%A3%8E%E8%80%85\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "兴风者 (page does not exist)")（神器类符文剑）

## 策略

阔剑属于不算强但还不错的武器。一般很快会被更好的武器（如[精灵阔剑](/wiki/%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%E9%98%94%E5%89%91 "精灵阔剑")）取代。

如果想要使用兴风者，或是用精灵阔剑作为副武器，可以用阔剑来锻炼对应的武器技能。

## 历史

阔剑最初于[NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0")加入游戏，在[NetHack 3.0.10](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.10 "NetHack 3.0.10")及更早版本，兴风者的基础物品是阔剑。

## 起源

[![维基百科](/images/thumb/f/f8/Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png/50px-Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png)](/wiki/File:Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png "维基百科")

[维基百科](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/zh:Main_Page "wikipedia:zh:Main Page")相关条目：

***[Basket-hilted sword](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Basket-hilted_sword "wikipedia:Basket-hilted sword")***

在历史上，“阔剑”一词一般指笼手剑，此类剑拥有笼状的护手保护持剑者。该名称中的“阔”字是相对造型相似，但刃更细的[护手刺剑](/index.php?title=%E6%8A%A4%E6%89%8B%E5%88%BA%E5%89%91\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "护手刺剑 (page does not exist)")而言的。

历史上，由于热兵器的发展使得很多传统护甲（如手甲和盾牌）效果下降，剑的护手逐渐得到了增强。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Broadsword/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

Some variants that incorporate the [Convict](/wiki/Convict "Convict") patch usually include their designated first [sacrifice gift](/wiki/Sacrifice_gift "Sacrifice gift"): [Luck Blade](/wiki/Luck_Blade "Luck Blade"), a chaotic artifact broadsword that acts as a [luck item](/wiki/Luck_item "Luck item") while carried.

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), a broadsword is always generated next to the left sink on the goal level of the [Yeoman quest](/wiki/Yeoman_quest "Yeoman quest").

[Upgrading](/wiki/Upgrading "Upgrading") a broadsword will produce an elven broadsword, and vice versa.

### UnNetHack

In [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"), [Luck Blade](/wiki/Luck_Blade_\(UnNetHack\) "Luck Blade (UnNetHack)") is a chaotic artifact broadsword that acts as the first sacrifice gift for Convicts.

### dNetHack

[dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack") add the [isamusei](/index.php?title=Isamusei\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Isamusei (page does not exist)"), [beamsword](/index.php?title=Beamsword\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Beamsword (page does not exist)") and [force sword](/index.php?title=Force_sword\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Force sword (page does not exist)") as weapons that use the broadsword skill.

[The Water Crystal](/wiki/The_Water_Crystal "The Water Crystal") increases a character's skill cap for broadswords by 1 while carried.

Several artifacts in dNetHack use the broadsword skill:

- [Fire Brand](/wiki/Fire_Brand "Fire Brand") and [Frost Brand](/wiki/Frost_Brand "Frost Brand") can generate in broadsword form.

- The [Fuma-itto no Ken](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#Fuma-itto_no_Ken "DNetHack artifacts") is a chaotic broadsword that is permanently [poisoned](/wiki/Poison "Poison"), grants +1 [to-hit](/wiki/To-hit "To-hit") and +1d8 damage bonuses versus cross-aligned targets, and can be [invoked](/wiki/Invoke "Invoke") to [create a stack of](/wiki/Create_ammo "Create ammo") [shuriken](/wiki/Shuriken "Shuriken").

- The [Atma Weapon](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#Atma_Weapon "DNetHack artifacts") is an unaligned beamsword that can be [applied](/wiki/Applied "Applied") to turn it on and off, and follows [lightsaber](/wiki/Lightsaber "Lightsaber") rules with the following exceptions:

  - While on, it deals 3d10+(3x enchantment) to both large and small monsters, with bonuses of +1d6 to-hit and +3d6 damage against [nasty](/wiki/M2_NASTY "M2 NASTY") monsters.
  - If wielded without [drain resistance](/wiki/Drain_resistance "Drain resistance"), Atma Weapon adds +1dx damage (where *x* is the wielder's current experience level) while severely reducing the wielder's natural healing rate, and scales its damage with their current HP percentage. Additionally, if Atma Weapon wielded while cursed and activated, or else it is activated while cursed or uncharged, it will drain an experience level and uncurse and/or charge itself.
  - If wielded with drain resistance, its base damage is decreased to 2d10+(2x enchantment) against all monsters.

- [Glamdring](/wiki/Glamdring_\(dNetHack\) "Glamdring (dNetHack)") is a lawful elven broadsword that favors [Nobles](/wiki/Noble "Noble") and is the first sacrifice gift for [dwarven](/wiki/Dwarf_\(starting_race\) "Dwarf (starting race)") [Knights](/wiki/Knight "Knight"). It has +1d5 to-hit and deals +1d10 damage versus all monsters, along with dealing an additional +1d20 to [orcs](/wiki/Orc_\(monster_attribute\) "Orc (monster attribute)") and [demons](/wiki/MA_DEMON "MA DEMON") and [warning of both monster types](/wiki/Warned_of_monster_type "Warned of monster type") while wielded. Glamdring cannot be knocked out of the player character's hands while wielded.

- [The Rod of the Elvish Lords](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#The_Rod_of_the_Elvish_Lords "DNetHack artifacts") is a lawful [elven](/wiki/Elf_\(starting_race\) "Elf (starting race)") Noble-favoring artifact that can take the form of an elven broadsword, and engraves at the same quality as an [athame](/wiki/Athame "Athame") in this form.

### DynaHack

In [DynaHack](/wiki/DynaHack "DynaHack"), [Luck Blade](/wiki/Luck_Blade_\(DynaHack\) "Luck Blade (DynaHack)") is an [intelligent artifact](/wiki/Intelligent_artifact "Intelligent artifact") and is otherwise the same as in UnNetHack.

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), [Monks](/wiki/Monk "Monk") and [Rangers](/wiki/Ranger "Ranger") can now train the broadsword skill - Monks can reach Basic, Rangers can reach Skilled, and Knights can reach Expert.

Luck Blade has the same traits as in UnNetHack, but is made of [steel](/wiki/Steel "Steel") rather than iron.

A broadsword can be created at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") by combining a [scimitar](/wiki/Scimitar "Scimitar") and a [short sword](/wiki/Short_sword "Short sword"). Broadswords can be used to create a few items:

- A broadsword can be combined with an [axe](/wiki/Axe "Axe") to create a [battle-axe](/wiki/Battle-axe "Battle-axe").
- A broadsword can be combined with a [long sword](/wiki/Long_sword "Long sword") to create a [two-handed sword](/wiki/Two-handed_sword "Two-handed sword")
- A broadsword can be combined with a [dagger](/wiki/Dagger "Dagger") to create a [runesword](/wiki/Runesword "Runesword").
- A broadsword can be combined with a [spear](/wiki/Spear "Spear") to create a [partisan](/wiki/Partisan "Partisan").

## 百科文本

Bring me my broadsword  
And clear understanding.  
Bring me my cross of gold,  
As a talisman.

\[ "Broadsword" (refrain) by Ian Anderson ]

阔剑（broadsword）是NetHack中的一种近战武器。武士称其为忍者大刀（ninja-to）。

生成

阔剑在随机生成武器中占比0.8%。

此外，岩德军团中尉生成时有1⁄2的概率携带阔剑[1]。炎魔生成时一定会携带阔剑[2]。

  • 杀兽剑（神器类精灵阔剑）
  • 兴风者（神器类符文剑）

策略

阔剑属于不算强但还不错的武器。一般很快会被更好的武器（如精灵阔剑）取代。

如果想要使用兴风者，或是用精灵阔剑作为副武器，可以用阔剑来锻炼对应的武器技能。

历史

阔剑最初于NetHack 3.0.0加入游戏，在NetHack 3.0.10及更早版本，兴风者的基础物品是阔剑。

起源

Basket-hilted sword

在历史上，“阔剑”一词一般指笼手剑，此类剑拥有笼状的护手保护持剑者。该名称中的“阔”字是相对造型相似，但刃更细的护手刺剑而言的。

历史上，由于热兵器的发展使得很多传统护甲（如手甲和盾牌）效果下降，剑的护手逐渐得到了增强。

Variants

Some variants that incorporate the Convict patch usually include their designated first sacrifice gift: Luck Blade, a chaotic artifact broadsword that acts as a luck item while carried.

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, a broadsword is always generated next to the left sink on the goal level of the Yeoman quest.

Upgrading a broadsword will produce an elven broadsword, and vice versa.

UnNetHack

In UnNetHack, Luck Blade is a chaotic artifact broadsword that acts as the first sacrifice gift for Convicts.

dNetHack

dNetHack and notdNetHack add the isamusei, beamsword and force sword as weapons that use the broadsword skill.

The Water Crystal increases a character's skill cap for broadswords by 1 while carried.

Several artifacts in dNetHack use the broadsword skill:

  • Fire Brand and Frost Brand can generate in broadsword form.
  • The Fuma-itto no Ken is a chaotic broadsword that is permanently poisoned, grants +1 to-hit and +1d8 damage bonuses versus cross-aligned targets, and can be invoked to create a stack of shuriken.
  • The Atma Weapon is an unaligned beamsword that can be applied to turn it on and off, and follows lightsaber rules with the following exceptions:
    • While on, it deals 3d10+(3x enchantment) to both large and small monsters, with bonuses of +1d6 to-hit and +3d6 damage against nasty monsters.
    • If wielded without drain resistance, Atma Weapon adds +1dx damage (where x is the wielder's current experience level) while severely reducing the wielder's natural healing rate, and scales its damage with their current HP percentage. Additionally, if Atma Weapon wielded while cursed and activated, or else it is activated while cursed or uncharged, it will drain an experience level and uncurse and/or charge itself.
    • If wielded with drain resistance, its base damage is decreased to 2d10+(2x enchantment) against all monsters.
  • Glamdring is a lawful elven broadsword that favors Nobles and is the first sacrifice gift for dwarven Knights. It has +1d5 to-hit and deals +1d10 damage versus all monsters, along with dealing an additional +1d20 to orcs and demons and warning of both monster types while wielded. Glamdring cannot be knocked out of the player character's hands while wielded.
  • The Rod of the Elvish Lords is a lawful elven Noble-favoring artifact that can take the form of an elven broadsword, and engraves at the same quality as an athame in this form.

DynaHack

In DynaHack, Luck Blade is an intelligent artifact and is otherwise the same as in UnNetHack.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, Monks and Rangers can now train the broadsword skill - Monks can reach Basic, Rangers can reach Skilled, and Knights can reach Expert.

Luck Blade has the same traits as in UnNetHack, but is made of steel rather than iron.

A broadsword can be created at a forge by combining a scimitar and a short sword. Broadswords can be used to create a few items:

  • A broadsword can be combined with an axe to create a battle-axe.
  • A broadsword can be combined with a long sword to create a two-handed sword
  • A broadsword can be combined with a dagger to create a runesword.
  • A broadsword can be combined with a spear to create a partisan.

== 策略 ==
阔剑属于不算强但还不错的武器。一般很快会被更好的武器（如[[精灵阔剑]]）取代。

如果想要使用兴风者，或是用精灵阔剑作为副武器，可以用阔剑来锻炼对应的武器技能。

== 历史 ==
阔剑最初于[[NetHack 3.0.0]]加入游戏，在[[NetHack 3.0.10]]及更早版本，兴风者的基础物品是阔剑。

== 起源 ==
{{wikipedia/zh-CN|Basket-hilted sword}}

在历史上，“阔剑”一词一般指笼手剑，此类剑拥有笼状的护手保护持剑者。该名称中的“阔”字是相对造型相似，但刃更细的[[护手刺剑]]而言的。

历史上，由于热兵器的发展使得很多传统护甲（如手甲和盾牌）效果下降，剑的护手逐渐得到了增强。

==Variants==
{{translation/zh-CN|n}}
Some variants that incorporate the [[Convict]] patch usually include their designated first [[sacrifice gift]]: [[Luck Blade]], a chaotic artifact broadsword that acts as a [[luck item]] while carried.

===SLASH'EM===
In [[SLASH'EM]], a broadsword is always generated next to the left sink on the goal level of the [[Yeoman quest]].

[[Upgrading]] a broadsword will produce an elven broadsword, and vice versa.

===UnNetHack===
In [[UnNetHack]], [[Luck Blade (UnNetHack)|Luck Blade]] is a chaotic artifact broadsword that acts as the first sacrifice gift for Convicts.

===dNetHack===
[[dNetHack]] and [[notdNetHack]] add the [[isamusei]], [[beamsword]] and [[force sword]] as weapons that use the broadsword skill.

[[The Water Crystal]] increases a character's skill cap for broadswords by 1 while carried.

Several artifacts in dNetHack use the broadsword skill:

* [[Fire Brand]] and [[Frost Brand]] can generate in broadsword form.
* The [[dNetHack artifacts#Fuma-itto no Ken|Fuma-itto no Ken]] is a chaotic broadsword that is permanently [[poison]]ed, grants +1 [[to-hit]] and +1d8 damage bonuses versus cross-aligned targets, and can be [[invoke]]d to [[Create ammo|create a stack of]] [[shuriken]].
* The [[dNetHack artifacts#Atma Weapon|Atma Weapon]] is an unaligned beamsword that can be [[applied]] to turn it on and off, and follows [[lightsaber]] rules with the following exceptions:
** While on, it deals 3d10+(3x enchantment) to both large and small monsters, with bonuses of +1d6 to-hit and +3d6 damage against [[M2 NASTY|nasty]] monsters.
** If wielded without [[drain resistance]], Atma Weapon adds +1dx damage (where ''x'' is the wielder's current experience level) while severely reducing the wielder's natural healing rate, and scales its damage with their current HP percentage. Additionally, if Atma Weapon wielded while cursed and activated, or else it is activated while cursed or uncharged, it will drain an experience level and uncurse and/or charge itself.
** If wielded with drain resistance, its base damage is decreased to 2d10+(2x enchantment) against all monsters.
* [[Glamdring (dNetHack)|Glamdring]] is a lawful elven broadsword that favors [[Noble]]s and is the first sacrifice gift for [[Dwarf (starting race)|dwarven]] [[Knight]]s. It has +1d5 to-hit and deals +1d10 damage versus all monsters, along with dealing an additional +1d20 to [[Orc (monster attribute)|orcs]] and [[MA_DEMON|demons]] and [[Warned of monster type|warning of both monster types]] while wielded. Glamdring cannot be knocked out of the player character's hands while wielded.
* [[dNetHack artifacts#The Rod of the Elvish Lords|The Rod of the Elvish Lords]] is a lawful [[Elf (starting race)|elven]] Noble-favoring artifact that can take the form of an elven broadsword, and engraves at the same quality as an [[athame]] in this form.

===DynaHack===
In [[DynaHack]], [[Luck Blade (DynaHack)|Luck Blade]] is an [[intelligent artifact]] and is otherwise the same as in UnNetHack.

===EvilHack===
In [[EvilHack]], [[Monk]]s and [[Ranger]]s can now train the broadsword skill - Monks can reach Basic, Rangers can reach Skilled, and Knights can reach Expert.

Luck Blade has the same traits as in UnNetHack, but is made of [[steel]] rather than iron.

A broadsword can be created at a [[Forge (dungeon feature)|forge]] by combining a [[scimitar]] and a [[short sword]]. Broadswords can be used to create a few items:

* A broadsword can be combined with an [[axe]] to create a [[battle-axe]].
* A broadsword can be combined with a [[long sword]] to create a [[two-handed sword]]
* A broadsword can be combined with a [[dagger]] to create a [[runesword]].
* A broadsword can be combined with a [[spear]] to create a [[partisan]].
